S06bsa051_u:1090_44: abhyavakiranti purastāt / prakaranti triṣu pārśveṣu / saṃpravikiranti punaścaturṣvapi [RSt_197] pārśveṣu /
S06bsa051_u:1090_45: dharmāśayaviśuddhyeti dharme yā teṣāṃ śraddhācchandayoḥ śuddhiḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1090_47: sanniśrayatā bhājanatā / śraddhārhe yā śraddhadhānatā tayā /
S06bsa051_u:1090_48: vinipāto durgatigamanam / aviṣṭitaṃ avicchinnam / tuṣṭa iti prītaḥ / udagra iti tayā prītyā unnatapūrvakāyaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1090_51: tajjātamasyeti tathoktaḥ / tasya śrṛṇoti smeti sambandhavivakṣayāpādāne ṣaṣṭhī /
S06bsa051_u:1091_9: sā ca samatā tathatā / tayā nirvikārānsarvadharmān paśyatīti sarvadhamanirvikāradarśī /
S06bsa051_u:1091_11: eṣu samādhiṣviti krameṇa sarveṣu sthitaḥ san /
S06bsa051_u:1091_14: naikasmin kāle 'nekastathāgata ekasyaiva sarvasattvārthakriyāsu śakteriti cet /
S06bsa051_u:1091_15: nityameka eva buddhastasyaivānantamāyuradhiṣṭhātuṃ śakteriti kinneṣyate? hetubalādanyepi bhavantīti cet /
S06bsa051_u:1091_16_0: hetubalādeva tarhi yugapadananteṣu lokadhātuṣvanantāstathāgatā jāyanta iti ko virodhaḥ? yathā buddhau cakravartinau sakṛdekatra
S06bsa051_u:1091_16_1: caturdvīpake lokadhātau notpadyete niḥsapatnakarmakāritvāt tathā tathāgatau trisāhasre lokadhātāviti mahārathaiḥ kṣuṇṇametat /
S06bsa051_u:1092_0: gatiṃ gatā iti / gatirapratidyātaḥ / tāṃ prāptāḥ / śikṣāpita iti śikṣāṃ prāpitaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1092_1: tatkṛtamiti / yadeva tena purva kṛtam / dhārayitavyaṃ cetasi na vismartavyam /
S06bsa051_u:1092_2: celaṃ vastram / tasya uṇḍukaḥ śiraśāṭaka ityarthaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1092_3: utkaṇṭhā śokaḥ / paritasanaṃ duḥkhāsikā / kāṣṭhāgatā prītiḥ prema / guṇavatsu cetaso 'kāluṣyaṃ prasādaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1092_5: arbhyahaṇaṃ gauravam / katamaṃ śabdamityata āha / ghoṣamityādi / katamaṃ bhoṣamiṃtyāha / kaḥ pureṣeṇetyādi / atikrāmayiṣyatīti mitāṃ hrasvo na bhavati /
S06bsa051_u:1092_8: ataḥ pañcamī yuktā bhavati / yannuśabdastasmādarthe / paryutthāpayāmāseti vyagrīkṛtavān /
S06bsa051_u:1092_9: yatheti yataḥ / asthimajjayāśceti / majjanśabdasya liṅgavyatyayena striyāṃ ḍāp sīmāvat /
S06bsa051_u:1093_0: viditābhiprāya āha / alpotsuka ityādi / utsuka autsukyam / yattat kṣaṇaṃ lavamapi tat / tanmuhūrtamapi tat / trayāṇāmupādānaṃ tu śrotṛṇāṃ śraddhabhedāt /
S06bsa051_u:1094_3: sphuṭa iti prāptaḥ / sahadarśanāditi darśanātkāraṇāddarśanena sahaivaityarthaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1095_1: / āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāṃ triśattamaḥ parivartaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1097_0: evamukta ityādi / na khalvityādi pratijñā / acalitā hi tathateti hetuḥ / tathāgatānāṃ kimāgatamiti cedāha /
S06bsa051_u:1097_1: yā cetyādi / evamuttarepi hetavaḥ sasamarthanā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1097_2: sarve caite hetavaḥ śūnyatāparyāyā nimittabhedāttu bhedaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1097_5: na hi kulaputrānyatretyādi / tathataiva suviśuddhā tathāgata iti bhāvaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1097_6: sa hi teṣāṃ svābhāvikaḥ kāya iti nyāyaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1097_8: yā cetyādi / eṣāmeva dharmāṇāmiti tathatādīnāṃ tathateti parikalpitarūpaśūnyatā /
S06bsa051_u:1097_9: yā ca sarvadharmāṇāmiti skandhadhātvādīnāṃ yā ca tathāgatasya /
S06bsa051_u:1097_10: ekaivetyādiruddeśaḥ / punarekaivetyādi nirdeśaḥ / hetumāha / yadutāsattvāditi / adravyatvānna [RSt_199] punaryathālakṣaṇamabhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1097_13: tadyathāpītyādi / madhyānhakālasamaya iti / madhyānhaścāsau kālaśca / tasya samayaḥ / āgamanaṃ yathā ca grāmaṃ praviṣṭa iti viśaterarthasya gativiśeṣatvāt kartari ktaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1097_18: ata evāha abhūta iti / amoghaṃ dāyakasya mahāphalahetutvāt /
S06bsa051_u:1098_5: vāyuparamāṇava ityapare / tatra upadhānī tantrīveṣṭanaṃ cakulikā /
S06bsa051_u:1098_7: ādyantayoḥ na śabdo niścaratīti vacanaṃ madhye sarvatra sambandhanārtham /
S06bsa051_u:1099_1: jihmībhūtāni naṣṭacchāyāni / utsṛjanti smeti muñcanti sma /
S06bsa051_u:1099_2: vihāyasamiti ākāśam / svakena kāyena dharmodgatamabhicchādayati smeti tasyāgrataḥ sarvakāyena bhūmau patati smetyarthaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1099_4: avakrāmaṇaṃ praveśanam / yadvayamiti yadā vayam / anuvartamānā ityanukurvatyaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1099_6: iti pratisaṃkhyāyeti evaṃ nirūpya sarvāṇi tānīti dārikāśatāni /
S06bsa051_u:1100_7: kutaḥ? sarvadharmasamatayā / sā hi dharmadhātvālambanā / sa ca samānaḥ sarvadharmeṣu /
S06bsa051_u:1100_15: mananāccalatīti cedāha / prajñāpāramitāyā amananatā / kutaḥ? sarvadharmāmananatayā /
S06bsa051_u:1100_16: amananā hi sarvadharmāḥ / na te kiñcinmanyante niḥsvabhāvatvāt /
S06bsa051_u:1100_17: tataḥ sāpyamananā / kimasau kenāpi stambhitā yato na calatīti cedāha /
S06bsa051_u:1100_20: na hi vivekāccalanti sarvadharmāḥ kenāpi stambhitāḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1100_21: kiṃ tarhi? prakṛtyaiva viveke sthirāstataḥ prajñāpāramitāpi sthirā /
S06bsa051_u:1100_24: kutaḥ? sarvadharmāṇāmekarasatayā tathataikarasā hi sarvadharmāḥ svalakṣaṇānāmabhāvāt /
S06bsa051_u:1100_28: tathā hi dvau paryantau pūrvā ca koṭiraparā ca /
S06bsa051_u:1100_35: tasmādanutpādāḥ / tadvatprajñāpāramitāpi / anirodhā prajñāpāramitā / kutaḥ? sarvadharmāṇāmanirodhatayā /
S06bsa051_u:1100_39: tathāhi gaganasya nāsti paryanto daśasu dikṣu triṣu cādhveṣu /
S06bsa051_u:1100_42: yathā hyākāśasya nāstyantastathaiva daśadiglokadhātūnāṃ kimpunarananteṣu lokadhātuṣu samudrāṇām /
S06bsa051_u:1100_44: tadvatprajñāpāramitāyāḥ / tathā hi yā teṣāṃ samudrāṇāṃ tathatā yā ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā ca prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
S06bsa051_u:1101_4: yathā hyekarasamākāśaṃ prakṛtyā tathāpi [RSt_201] merupārśvānāṃ vicitrāṇāmādhipatyāttadvadeva vicitraṃ khyāti /
S06bsa051_u:1101_9: nirābhāse yā ca parimārthike jñāne sattvanāmavatāraṇāya nirdiśyate,
S06bsa051_u:1102_0: nanu saiva nirābhāsā prajñāpāramitā svayamanubhūyamānaṃ paramārthamitthaṃ niścinoti niḥsvabhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti /
S06bsa051_u:1102_3: prajñāpāramitāyā yākalpanatā na sā kiñcidvikalpayati vikalpapāragatatvāt /
S06bsa051_u:1103_2: yatrānyadrūpaṃ nāsti tatrāvaśyaṃ tamaḥ prakāśo vāsti /
S06bsa051_u:1103_4_0: yathaiva samudrāparyantatayā prajñāpāramitāparyantatāsmābhirvyākhyātā tathaiva sattvānāmānantyāt vedanāparyantatayāpi saṃskāraparyantatayāpi
S06bsa051_u:1103_5: atha yā vijñānaskandhāparyantatayā yā ca vijñānadhātvaparyantatayā tayoḥ ko viśeṣaḥ? skandhadhātuśabdābhyāṃ prayogakṛtaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1104_2: tasya yā sarvadharmeṣu samatā tayomānena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ samatā sarvadharmeṣu sarvadharmāsambhedanatayā prajñāpāramitāsambhedanateti sarvadharmāṇāmasambhedo abhedaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1104_8: rūpasya jaḍatvāt / śeṣāṇāmapyātmani paratra vā grāhakatvāyogāt /
S06bsa051_u:1104_14: sā sarvadharmāṇāṃ na vidyate tasmādavibhāvanayā samatā teṣām /
S06bsa051_u:1104_17: ceṣṭā īhāvyāpāraḥ / avyāpāraḥ sarvadharmāḥ / kathaṃ tarhi kaścitkutaścidutpadyate? idaṃpratyayamātreṇa /
S06bsa051_u:1104_18: asmin satīdaṃ bhavati, asati na bhavatītyetāvatā hetuphalabhāvaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1104_21: yathā hi dharmāḥ parebhyo na deśyante nirviṣayatvādvācaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1104_22: tathā svayamapi na cintyante na nirūpyante vāgvikalpayorekārthatvāt /
S06bsa051_u:1104_24: veditavyetyante yat paṭhyate tatsarvadharmasamatādivākyeṣu sarveṣu sambadhyate 'ntardīpakatvāt /
S06bsa051_u:1105_0: atha khalvityādi / atheti deśanāparisamāptau / tathā niṣaṇṇasvaṃveti śrutāsanādanutthitasya /
S06bsa051_u:1105_1: athetyuddeśaḥ / kṛtaḥ / tasyaiva nirdeśaḥ tasyāṃ velāyāmiti /
S06bsa051_u:1105_2: yenaiva krameṇa yairevākāraiḥ prajñāpāramitā deśitā tenaiva krameṇa tairevākāraistriṃśatsamādhaya utpannā iti samudāyārthaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1107_0: iti / kiṃ tarhyālambanam? tadeva vastu yathāsvam /
S06bsa051_u:1109_0: āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sāratamānāmni pañjikāyāṃ ratnākaraśāntiviracitāyāmekatriṃśattamaḥ parivartaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1111_5: sarvāsu ca jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūdityuddeśaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1111_6: asya nirdeśa uttaro granthaḥ svapnāntaragatopīti yāvat /
S06bsa051_u:1112_3: atra ca tathāgatādhiṣṭhāneneti vacanaṃ kimartham? mahārthatvābhdagavatī bavhantarāyā ca vinā buddhādhiṣṭhānena likhitumapi [na] śakyeti pradarśanārtham /
S06bsa051_u:1112_5: yathā asyāḥ śravaṇādikaṃ na vicchidyate tathā tvayā kartavyamityarthaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1113_1: asmin mama samucchaya iti mama śarīre /
S06bsa051_u:1113_3: yata āha dvirapi trirapīti / parīndāmīti samarpayāmi / anuparīndamītyānukūlyaṃ samarpayāmi /
S06bsa051_u:1114_2: avocaditi bhāṣitavān / bhagavāniti śāstā / parārtharasikāstathāgatāḥ / parārtha ca parārthakriyā bhagavatyā deśanā /
S06bsa051_u:1114_3: tata āha / āttamanā iti / niruttaradharmadeśanayā prītaḥ sannityarthaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1114_6: sa kadācidabhilāṣe vartate / kadācitprītau / yadā prītau tadā tadālambanamevāsya karma bhavati /
S06bsa051_u:1114_8: eṣaiva deśanā / ke punaste śrotāra ityāha / te cetyādi / lokaḥ sattvasamūhaḥ / sa ca śrotṝṇāṃ rājagṛhasya ca prakṛtatvānmanuṣyasamūha eva kevalo gamyeta /
S06bsa051_u:1114_11: te ca bodhisattvādayaḥ sadevādiśca loka iti samuccayaḥ /
S06bsa051_u:1116_6: sūtraṃ tatte bhagavati mayā yaśca labdho vibhajya //
S06bsa051_u:1116_7: puṇyaskandhaḥ phalatu sa yathā yuktimuktiṃ prajānām /
S06bsa051_u:1117_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S06bsa051_u:1117_1: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
S06bsa051_u:1118_0: ?(?) samvat ā to rājñaḥ śrīharṣadevarājye śrīgaṇḍigulmaviṣaye /
